r.d: MDB is a merge of PEAR DB's and Metabases that provides a unified DB API. It also provides methods for DB portability and DB feature emulation. Most notably it features a DB independent XML-Schema manager.
r.n: Moved all DB management methods into a seperate class that is loaded on demand; MDB manager can now create an xml schema file from an existing DB;Improvements to the error handling, XMl schema manager and Metabase Wrapper as well as general formatting tweaks
